examples: She succeeded in persuading us all
I managed to carry the box upstairs
She pulled it off, even though we never thought her capable of it
The pianist negociated the difficult runs

definitions.text: be in charge of, act on, or dispose of
examples: I can deal with this crew of workers
She managed her parents' affairs after they got too old
We got by on just a gallon of gas
They made do on half a loaf of bread every day

definitions.text: achieve something by means of trickery or devious methods

examples: We could do with a little more help around here
The young violinist didn't manage her bow very well
